thread.title: Meet puppies for adoption at Westfield Hawthorn mall Oct. 24
thread.title_full: Meet puppies for adoption at Westfield Hawthorn mall Oct. 24

author: Daily Herald report
title: Meet puppies for adoption at Westfield Hawthorn mall Oct. 24
text:
Westfield Hawthorn shopping center and Animal Education and Rescue are hosting a "puppy pop-up" from 11 a.m. to 2 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 24, in honor of National Adopt-A-Dog month.
Visitors can play with and meet dogs in need of a loving home and begin the adoption process. The event will be held at GAP court at the mall, routes 60 and 21 in Vernon Hills.
For more information, call (847) 362-2600.
 News Vernon Hills Pets and Animals
